logout.usage: Use this command to log out and return to lobby.

ap warp lobby.usage: Teleport yourself back to the lobby server.

ap warp creative_lobby.usage: Teleport yourself back to the creative server's lobby. Only works in creative server.

ap warp center.usage: Put yourself back in the center of lobby server. Only works in lobby server.

!.usage: Send you message across the server. Messages without this prefix will only seen by players within 250 block radius range.

parameters.name: message
parameters.example: hi, anyone got location for ocean monument?

!!.usage: Send you message across the server and also to the specific channel in the Discord server.
